channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing light, 13th October
item.description:
The right hand light is not working on the Penge War Memorial… and it would be good to have it fixed before Remembrance Day

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Young Trees cut down, or missing, 13th October
item.description:
Hi, I have noticed that 2 young trees have been cut down or vandalised in Longland recreation park .There where 6 trees planted, now only 4 remain. Not sure if trees where cut down due to disease. They were near the allotment side of park. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Recreation Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building materials on pavement, 13th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Horrible stench in flat, 13th October
item.description:
There’s been this horrible smell in the building that has been wafting into my own flat that worsens when it rains. It has noticeably been getting worse, with a mix of sewage, rubbish and mice pee (?). The smell has seeped into the walls and has been coming in through plumbing too. I can also hear either rats or mice running in the ceiling/walls and scratching at the walls. It has been many months and the smell has just been getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): David Mews, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heavy leafing blocking drains and rotting + litter, 13th October
item.description:
This issue was marked as 'fixed' on 06/10 but no cleaning was performed, so it should not have been closed. Reopening issue as it was emphatically not fixed and remains an issue. Heavy leafing blocking drains on Anerley Park Road plus heavy littering of empty take away food boxes, wrappers and cans. Please can this be addresses and not simply marked as fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Anerley Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 13th October
item.description:
This vehicle has got an expired MOT . It is parked in a parking bay opposite 58/60 Churchbury Road SE9 5HY. It's been parked there since last week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchbury Road, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Possible Carbon monoxide alarm, 13th October
item.description:
An alarms been going off in a nearby property since 5:30am 13th October. At first I thought it was someones morning alarm but its still going on now 530pm. My concern is that its someones carbon monoxide alarm as it doesnt sound like a usual morning alarm.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leabank Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
